attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore A Knighthood for all the Money he has raised for the NHS
attributes.additional_details: Because this 99 year old Vetran has served in one battle for the country and now hes helping to fight for the NHS & the country in the Covid 19 battle
attributes.background: We want the government to have this man honoured as hes doing a great job of raising funds for help towards the NHS

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
